headline: Is Fiserv Emerging Stronger After Worldpay Integration and Recent Share Price Drop?
summary: If you’re looking at Fiserv and wondering if now is the right time to invest, you’re not alone. With the stock closing at $138.18 yesterday, plenty of investors are weighing the potential for a turnaround against the stock’s recent stumbles. Over the past week, Fiserv slipped by 1.1%, and the 30-day return is also a modest -1.9%. Taking a step back for the year, the numbers look rougher, with a sharp -32.9% return year-to-date and -20.9% over the past year. However, the longer-term view tells...
